manager

Class MessagesManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • manager.MessagesManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class MessagesManager
extends java.lang.Thread
    Class in charge of managing a single Connection. It reads Message objects form the assigned Connection and acts accordingly.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class java.lang.Thread

        java.lang.Thread.State, java.lang.Thread.UncaughtExceptionHandler

    • Constructor Detail

      • MessagesManager

        public MessagesManager(Connection connection,
                       java.util.Map<Connection,java.util.List<java.lang.String>> subscriptions,
                       ConstraintsManager constraintsManager)
        Manages incoming Messages from the provided Connection.
        Parameters:
        connection - The Connection used to communicate with the other end.
        subscriptions - The Map containing the subscriptions for each Connection of this Broker.
        constraintsManager - The ConstraintsManager that decides whether a MessagePublish is accepted or not.
